name: Time Tiger
description:
Your name... your name doesn't matter. 

What matters is the power at your fingertips- bending time and gravity to your will.

Buried under the sand, lies the key to saving the towns circling the forgotten tomb of the Tigress Queen. Her temple has been unnavigable for centuries. Until you came along. 

Her treasure awaits, patient, for you and only you. 

The question is... are you ready to face her treacherous temple?

-

Controls

A & D to move (Left Stick on controller)
W to jump (A on controller)
Hold L-Shift to rewind (LB on controller)
E to invert (RB on controller)

Credits

Font from DaFont. All other assets created by us.
